function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The system relies on facial image data, potentially raising privacy concerns for individuals whose images are used for training and detection.","Impact":"Violation of privacy, opposition from individuals, and potential legal consequences.","Mitigation":"Use anonymized image data, obtain consent for image use, and comply with data protection regulations.","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, consent management systems, and compliance tools for data protection regulations.","People":"Individuals whose facial images are used, regulatory authorities, and legal experts.","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory authorities, and legal teams."},{"Description":"The use of a facial mask detection system may lead to a false sense of security among the public, potentially reducing adherence to other important preventive measures for COVID-19.","Impact":"Decrease in overall adherence to preventive measures, potential increase in COVID-19 transmission, and public health implications.","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns to emphasize the importance of multiple preventive measures, clear communication of the limitations of the system, and ongoing public health guidance.","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, educational campaigns, and multi-faceted preventive measure promotion.","People":"Public health organizations, communication specialists, and policy makers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, communication agencies, and government departments."},{"Description":"Reliance on a technology-driven approach without addressing underlying social and behavioral factors may overlook the root causes of non-compliance with mask-wearing interventions.","Mitigation":"Incorporation of behavioral science expertise, community engagement strategies, and social determinants of health in intervention planning.","Technologies":"Behavioral science frameworks, community engagement platforms, and social determinant analysis tools.","People":"Behavioral scientists, community organizers, and public health researchers.","Owner":"Public health research institutions, community organizations, and behavioral science experts."}]}
